name: starter-npm
description: A project starter using only npm scripts

scripts.clean: npm run clean:prod & npm run clean:build
scripts.js:dev: watchify -d -t babelify -t aliasify -t stringify app/scripts/app.js -o app/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.js:build: browserify -t babelify -t aliasify -t stringify app/scripts/app.js | uglify.js -o dist/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.assets:build: cp app/assets dist/assets & cp app/data dist/data
scripts.views:build: cp app/index.html dist & cp app/views dist/views
scripts.start: npm run styles:dev & npm run js:dev & npm run browsersync:dev
scripts.build: npm run clean:build & npm run views:build & npm run assets:build & npm run styles:build & npm run js:build & npm run browsersync:build

author: Jeremie Drazic
